vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τίμων, -ωνος, ὁ
Timon: Act.6:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.6.5
§ Timon, "precious, valuable"
Timon, (Proper name), Acts 6:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提門 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "值得尊敬的"
耶路撒冷教會的七個執事之一 #徒 6:5|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提门 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "值得尊敬的"
耶路撒冷教会的七个执事之一 #徒 6:5|
